summary: SWITCH THAT DETECTS WHEN DRIVERS DOOR IS AJAR IS DEFECTIVE AND SHOWS THE DOOR IS OPEN AT ALL TIMES.  THEREFORE THE DOME LIGHT STAYS ON AND THE DOOR LOCKS WILL NOT LOCK.  THE DOORS REMAINS UNLOCKED AT ALL SPEEDS,      PLEASE DO SOMETHING BEFORE ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF FORD VEHICLES  (SEVERAL MODEL YEARS AND SEVERAL MODELS) IS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT WHERE SOME CHILD IS THROWN FROM THE VEHICLE BECAUSE THE DOORS OPENED.    HELP!!!  *TR
